snippet: The novel, to be released in May, is Ms. Reichl’s first, and the publisher has acquired two more.
abstract: Random House is set to publish debut novel Delicious! by food critic and memoirist Ruth Reichl.
lead_paragraph: The novel, to be released in May, is Ms. Reichl’s first, and the publisher has acquired two more.

headline.main: Random House Acquires Novel by Ruth Reichl
headline.print_headline:
A Book Deal
For Ruth Reichl
